mapper.update: UPDATE EXCHANGE_POLGUAAPP set readTag1 = 1,auditResult = 'yes',handingNo = #{p.handingNo} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM EXCHANGE_POLGUAAPP WHERE EXCHANGE_TYPE = 'TOJYJ' and id = 'a49804aa2a354be8a0d841211cfb7a84'
select * from EXCHANGE_POLGUAAPP exp where exp.handingNo = #{handingNo}
